setting.label: Host
setting.help_text: DNS name or IP of server containing database or 'localhost' which will connect to the server using a unix pipe.

setting.label: Port
setting.help_text: Port on which the remote database server listens.

setting.label: User
setting.help_text: Database user name with read and write access to MythTV tables

setting.label: Host Identifier
setting.help_text: Unique identifier for this host in the database.

setting.label: Enabled
setting.help_text: If checked MythTV will attempt to wake the remote database host.

setting.label: Reconnect Count
setting.help_text: How often to attempt reconnecting to the database.

setting.label: Retry Count
setting.help_text: How often to attempt to wake the remote database host.

setting.label: Command
setting.help_text: Command to execute to wake the remote database host.
